question_text: 1. Did the representative document all of a client's personal particulars? (ASK ALL a - d)

sub_items.question_text: a. Age/DOB
b. Education qualifications
c. Language proficiency (f you fulfil any SC criteria)
d. Contact information

question_text: 2. CKA related information (Ask ALL a - c)

sub_items.question_text: a. Fin related work education
b. Fin related work experience
c. Past investment experience - past 3 yrs 6 txn
a. Financial objectives (Including the client's protection, savings, investments, or heath needs. Time horizon info should be indicated with the financial objectives) (ASK ALL a1 - a3)
a1) Check client's protection, savings, inv, or heath needs
a2) Time Horizon / tenure
a3) Budget
b. Risk tolerance or profile (ASK ALL b1-b2)
b1) Risk profiling questions - Asked risk profiling questions on what level of loss OR attitude towards risk/ fluctuations in investment shopper is willing to accept?
b2) Inform you of your assessed risk profile
c. Occupation or employment status
d. Financial situation (Including assets, liabilities, cash flow and annual income) (ASK ALL d1 - d4)
d1) Assets
d2) Liabilities
d3) Annual income
d4) Expenses
g. Current investment portfolio, including any life policies or collective investment schemes (ASK ALL g1-g2)
g1) Investment holdings - e.g. collective investment schemes
g2) Insurance policies
h. Inform you & properly document when amount to be committed is a substantial portion of your net worth or net annual cash flow surplus*
i. For any recommendation made in respect of any life policy, the no. of dependants of the client and the extent and duration of financial support required for each dependant
i1) the number of dependants of the client
i2) [IF CLIENT HAS DEPENDENTS] extent and duration of financial support required for dependants
